name: Improved Phasestrike
description: Choose up to five creatures you can see within range. Make a melee force attack against each one. On hit, a target takes 6d10 force damage. You can then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of one of the creatures you chose.

automation.text: Choose up to five creatures you can see within range. Make a melee force attack against each one. On hit, a target takes 6d10 force damage. You can then teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 5 feet of one of the creatures you chose.

name: Phasestrike
description:
Until the power ends, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

Once before the power ends, you can give yourself advantage on one weapon attack roll on your turn. That attack deals an extra 1d8 force damage on a hit. Whether you hit or miss, your walking speed increases by 30 feet until the end of that turn.
